alternative_parents.description: Inorganic compounds consisting of an assembly of cations and anions.
alternative_parents.name: Inorganic salts

alternative_parents.description: Inorganic chemical compounds with one or more oxygen atoms combined with another element.
alternative_parents.name: Inorganic oxides

class.description: Inorganic oxoanionic compounds in which the heaviest atom not in an oxoanion is a lanthanide.
class.name: Lanthanide oxoanionic compounds

description: This compound belongs to the class of inorganic compounds known as lanthanide sulfates. These are inorganic compounds in which the largest oxoanion is sulfate, and in which the heaviest atom not in an oxoanion is a lanthanide.

direct_parent.description: Inorganic compounds in which the largest oxoanion is sulfate, and in which the heaviest atom not in an oxoanion is a lanthanide.
direct_parent.name: Lanthanide sulfates

kingdom.description: Compounds that do not contain a C atom. Exceptions are made for isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon trioxide, carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Inorganic compounds

subclass.description: Inorganic compounds in which the largest oxoanion is sulfate, and in which the heaviest atom not in an oxoanion is a lanthanide.
subclass.name: Lanthanide sulfates

superclass.description: Compounds that contains both metal and non metal atoms.
superclass.name: Mixed metal/non-metal compounds
